name: Steigenberger Hotelmanager
overview: Following an inheritance, you decide to get into the hotel business. You face the challenges that are placed on a manager in this economic sector. Staffing, pricing, promotions and all the other "little chores" of a successful businessman are part of their job. In the end, after successful management, there is fame. You run a hotel with a global reputation. A Steigenberger Hotel, of course. A guest arrives. Is the service okay? The pool in the Ibrer hotel complex doesn't have to be paid for at first, later it's a must. Welcome. A well-stocked hotel is the key to success. An excellent kitchen and a pleasant ambience are born into a good hotel and allow for a better room price.
